full_instructions: On the next screen, you will be presented with instructions for the [b]Stroop[/b] activity.
During this activity, you will see a color name in a particular font color.
You will be asked to identify the color of the font, not the word itself.
Word and font color might not always match.
Each trial will be separated by a fixation.
[b]Hint:[/b] Please try to answer as quickly and accurately as possible.
quick_instructions: --You will see COLOR WORDS presented in the center of the screen.
--For each COLOR WORD displayed, touch the word at the bottom of that matches the color the FONT the COLOR WORD is displayed in.
--Please respond as quickly and accurately as possible.
